workshop.title: Retail Demo
workshop.description: This workshop will walk you through the process of using the Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) to build and apply predictive Machine Learning models.

labs.title: Lab 100 - Getting Started with Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) and Oracle Application Express (APEX)
labs.description: Spin up an ADW instance and create an application using APEX

labs.title: Lab 200 - Using OML to Run a Machine Learning Model and SQL Developer to Grant User Privileges
labs.description: Create users in SQL Developer and a ML model in OML

labs.title: Lab 300 - Enabling Oracle Restful Data Services (ORDS) with APEX to Call and Create APIs
labs.description: Create and call APIs using ORDS and APEX

labs.title: Lab 400 - Getting Started with Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC)
labs.description: Spin up an OAC instance and connect it to ADW

labs.title: Lab 500 - Visualizations in Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC)
labs.description: Visualize data and machine learning models using OAC
